QuestData.Title: Unwelcome Guests
QuestData.Description: Our scouts have spotted iron dwarves in the valley north of here. I overheard King Stormheart sending you to visit Drom and I'm admittedly a bit worried about'm.$B$BIf you find any iron dwarves when you head down there, put'm down hard and fast for me, eh? I dun think they know exactly where we are or how to get here just yet, and I'd prefer to keep it that way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fjorlin Frostbrow at Frosthold wants you to kill 10 Stormforged Invaders.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were the scouts right? Were there dwarves down there?
QuestData.RewardText: Grim news, $G lad:lass;. Those iron dwarves seem to be increasing in numbers... we've been seeing them all over the mountains. I smell war coming.$B$BThank you for dealing with this bunch... a little more time bought.
